dashboard.empty_description: Quickly insert bar charts, line charts, pie charts and other component types to intuitively display data and make business dynamics clear at a glance
dashboard.empty_text: Select a widget and start building your data dashboard
dashboard.leave_to_new_dashboard_descrip: Whether or not you want to jump to the newly created dashboard, please note that the current dashboard your changes will not be saved.
dashboard.plugin.trigger_confirm_text: Is the execution of the operation confirmed?
dashboard.set_as_home_dashboard_descript: Is it confirmed to set the current dashboard as set as the home dashboard, this operation will overwrite the existing home dashboard?
